text: Kare-ra (shito-tachi) wa itta. `Ruto yo hontoni watashi-tachi wa, anata no omo no shitodearu. Kare-ra wa kesshite anata ni te o fureru koto wa dekinai. Sorede yoru no ma ni anata no kazoku o tsurete dete iki nasai. Soshite anata gata no naka, ichi-ri demo ushiro o furimuite wa naranai. Anata no tsuma wa betsudearu. Ka no on'na wa, kare-ra (sodomu no jumin) no sogu shita koto ni sogu surudearou. Kare-ra ni sadame rareta toki wa, sochodearu. Asa wa chikaide wanai ka
